The new breathing apparatuses will replace the fire company's 13-year-old air packs, and increase the overall safety of Mottville's 35 volunteer firefighters. It's going to help keep all the firefighters safe so they can enter burning buildings with the latest technology in air packs, Mottville volunteer Fire Chief Tim Baker said.
